subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The Tour de France will visit the French island of Corsica for the first time in 2013. The race will start with a trek from Porto-Vecchio to the town of Bastia.
snippet: The Tour de France will visit the French island of Corsica for the first time in 2013. The race will start with a trek from Porto-Vecchio to the town of Bastia.
